snippet: A leader of the Muslim Brotherhood’s political party said it had decided to support keeping the military-appointed cabinet and prime minister in place for six months.
abstract: Muslim Brotherhood, poised to dominate Egypt's Parliament, says it has decided to support keeping the military-appointed cabinet and prime minister in place for six months; party leader Essam el-Erian expresses hope that decision to put off an expected confrontation with nation's military rulers will encourage the United States to continue to support Egypt financially.
lead_paragraph: A leader of the Muslim Brotherhood’s political party said it had decided to support keeping the military-appointed cabinet and prime minister in place for six months.

headline.seo: Muslim Brotherhood Backs Egyptian Military’s Transition Date
headline.main: Islamists in Egypt Back Timing of Military Handover
headline.print_headline: Islamists In Egypt Back Date Of Handover

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
